thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 2 of 112
thread.title: Melissa845

author: Melissa845
title: Melissa845
text: I liked that there were a variety of options to choose from. I was happy with the price which was compatible or cheaper than the other websites I looked at. Package arrived quickly and intact. I am glad to hear that they take Medicaid in many states. When HDIS sent me my supplies they sent a catalogue. I passed the catalogue to an elderly friend of mine who does not use the internet,
